DOC.criteria: Confirmed diagnosis multiple myeloma evidence measurable disease . Relapsed refractory disease least one line prior therapy . Adequate bone marrow reserve . Received anticancer medication investigational therapy past 28 day . Intracranial disease epidural disease .
